roleset.name: separate, divide into smaller units or divide again.

role.descr: divided among/between, if separate from arg1
specific aspect of arg1 being used as criteria for subdivision
divided into what? Smaller parcel, resulting state of arg 1

example.name: subdivide-v: With resulting state
example.text: The government subdivided the land into 5-acre lots.

example.name: subdivide-v: Passive
example.text: A well-used economic development tool is the incubator, typically an office building that is subdivided and provides subsidized rent and admin. services to small business.

example.name: subdivision-n: with arg3
example.text: The administrative subdivision of Rome consists of the 15 sub-municipalities (municipi) of Rome's municipality.

roleset.note: SUBDIVIDE-V NOTES: Framed by Claire (from subdivide.01-v)
SUBDIVISION-N NOTES: arg3 added by Julia for consistency with other similar nouns. (from subdivision.01-n)
